Dialogue.Page: Yesterday I flew to the strange wall on the south pole of Lost Strings.
I am not sure what it is doing there, but I discovered that it is connected to three scrolls scattered across the solar system.
One of them is on the <color=orange>other side of Green Base</color>. Another is <color=orange>somewhere on Dried Tears</color>.
The last one seems to be <color=orange>connected to the giant banjo itself</color>.
I'm thrilled at the aspect of this discovery! I will schedule a day to explore further.
